comments.text:
Created attachment 9145871
Link to GitHub pull-request: https://github.com/mozilla-services/mozilla-pipeline-schemas/pull/540
The schema has been deployed, and a `v` has been added which will deploy at 0000 UTC tomorrow. In the meantime the pings are flowing through, with `v` going to `additionalProperties`.
